title: BioRiso
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bio restaurant inside the Eco Hotel La Residenza. Offers organic meals with vegetarian and vegan options such as pasta with seitan-bolognese sauce, tofu salad, tempeh, seitan sausages, seitan cutlet, and pizza with vegan cheese. Inside the hotel there is also the BiologiBar serving soy and rice milk cappuccino. Staying guests of the hotel can be served a vegan breakfast when requested.
